18using System.Collections.Generic;
19using UnityEngine;
20using UnityEngine.Windows.Speech;
21using System.Linq;
22
23namespace Valve.VR.InteractionSystem
24{
28 public class VoiceControl : MonoBehaviour
29 {
30 private CaseController _caseController;
31 private KeywordRecognizer _keywordRecognizer;
32 private Dictionary<string, System.Action> _keywords = new Dictionary<string, System.Action>();
33
37 void Start()
38 {
39 AddVoiceCommands();
40
41 _keywordRecognizer = new KeywordRecognizer(_keywords.Keys.ToArray());
42 _keywordRecognizer.OnPhraseRecognized += RecognizedSpeech;
43 _keywordRecognizer.Start();
44
45 _caseController = GetComponent<CaseController>();
46 }
47
52 private void RecognizedSpeech(PhraseRecognizedEventArgs speech)
53 {
54 _keywords[speech.text].Invoke();
55 }
56
60 private void AddVoiceCommands()
61 {
62 _keywords.Add("start", () =>
63 {
64 _caseController.StartCase();
65 });
66
67 _keywords.Add("show all", () =>
68 {
69 _caseController.ShowAll();
70 });
71
72 _keywords.Add("step next", () =>
73 {
74 _caseController.NextStep();
75 });
76
77 _keywords.Add("step back", () =>
78 {
79 _caseController.PreviousStep();
80 });
81
82 _keywords.Add("delete step", () =>
83 {
84 _caseController.Undo();
85 });
86
87 _keywords.Add("redo", () =>
88 {
89 _caseController.Redo();
90 });
91
92 _keywords.Add("train start", () =>
93 {
94 _caseController.TrainStart();
95 });
96
97 _keywords.Add("train stop", () =>
98 {
99 _caseController.TrainStop();
100 });
101 }
102 }
103}
